snippet.title: SOLARIS OFFWORLD COMBAT | VR Gameplay Trailer
snippet.description:
Solaris Offworld Combat VR Gameplay Trailer - (**NEW RELEASE DATE**) September 24th 2020 on Oculus Quest and Rift

From First Contact Entertainment -- developers behind hit multiplayer PSVR game Firewall Zero Hour -- comes Solaris Offworld Combat, the 4v4 arena-style sci-fi shooter focused on speed and intensity! Solaris is a multiplayer FPS built from the ground up for VR, launching September 24th 2020 on Oculus Quest and Rift, followed by PSVR.

Get ready to step into the role of an Athlon -- an elite VR athlete -- and put your skills to the test in this futuristic world of high-stakes, fast-paced VR combat. Start each game with your pistol, then run, sprint, and slide your way across the arena -- picking up weapons, equipment, and health packs along the way. Work with your team to take over the Control Point and win the match! 


#VR #SolarisOWC
